metadata.name: Text drawing No. 001 #1
metadata.description:
The work is done in a way that experiments different ways to visualize all finite beings. For artist, a body is a platform that allows him to capture the traces of his bodily movements and remember them. The artist extends his drawing and paints along the trajectory of the body, and the space of the body includes not only the volume of the body itself, but also the mobility of the body. 

#NFTart  #rhythmical  #drawing  #black & white
